sign-in.title: Your login code
sign-in.description: Use the verification code below to sign in to your account. This code is valid for a short time and can only be used once.
sign-in.ignore-email: If you didn't try to log in, you can safely ignore this email.
sign-in.automated-message: This is an automated message — please do not reply to this email.

email-verification.title: Confirm your email address
email-verification.heading: Confirm your email
email-verification.description: Thanks for signing up! Please confirm your email address by using the verification code below.
email-verification.ignore-email: If you didn't create an account with us, you can safely ignore this email.
email-verification.automated-message: This is an automated message, please do not reply to this email.

recovery-password.title: Reset your password
recovery-password.heading: Reset Your Password
recovery-password.description: We received a request to reset your password. Use this verification code below to create a new password.
recovery-password.ignore-email: If you didn't request a password reset, you can safely ignore this email.
recovery-password.automated-message: This is an automated message, please do not reply to this email.

organization-invitation.title: You've been invited to join {teamName}
organization-invitation.heading: Team Invitation
organization-invitation.invited_by: {invitedByUsername} ({invitedByEmail}) has invited you to join the {teamName} team.
organization-invitation.accept_invitation: To accept the invitation and start collaborating with the team, click the button below:
organization-invitation.copy_paste_link: Or copy and paste this link into your browser:
organization-invitation.ignore_email: If you were not expecting this invitation or do not know the sender, you can safely ignore this email.
organization-invitation.automated_message: This is an automated message — please do not reply to this email.
